title: Interval Notation Overview
text: Open parentheses "(" and ")" represent excluded bounds, while closed parentheses "[" and "]" represent included bounds.
speech: parenthesestheses "(" and ")" represent excluded bounds, while closed parentheses "[" and "]" represent included bounds.
pacedSpeech: Open parentheses "(" and ")" represent excluded bounds, while closed parentheses "[" and "]" represent included bounds.

title: Creating Our Notation
text: Using the general guide given in the previous hint, we can write the solution [1, 3)
